welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coral Springs, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant art scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Runyon's
restaurants.description: Runyon's is a steakhouse located in Coral Springs.
restaurants.address: 9810 W Sample Rd (W of University Dr.), Coral Springs, FL 33065

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport is where travelers can check-in, go through security, and access all gates and amenities.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Public Airport is dedicated to domestic flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Public Airport serves international flights and features duty-free shops and upscale restaurants for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit or data cap.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
